info.name: InoReader Turbo
info.description:
Minimal Theme,
Colorful titles,
Easily distinguishable read from unread items,
Possibility to Hide, from "All Articles", any of:
    "In Evernote",
    "In Readability",
    "In Instapaper",
    "In Pocket",
    "Trending",
